products.name: Peace Lily Plant
products.description: A beautiful indoor plant
products.about: The Peace Lily plant is a stunning indoor flowering plant with dark, glossy green leaves and occasional pearly white flowers that put any competitors to shame. Known to be one of the best air-purifying plants, the Peace Lily is a wonderful indoor companion with a fuss-free attitude and low maintenance requirements. It is also fairly fast-growing, making it the perfect lush plant for indoor displays.

Tips.title: Water twice a week
Tips.content: Always check your plants before watering, the topsoil should be dry to touch. For succulents allow the potting mix to dry completely before watering again.

Tips.title: Water
Tips.content: Water your Brazil Wood plant when the top 50% of the soil is dry. This plant is drought tolerant, so it’s better to let the soil dry out a bit between waterings.

Tips.title: Humidity
Tips.content: The Brazil Wood plant prefers higher humidity levels, but it can tolerate average humidity levels.

Tips.title: Temperature
Tips.content: The Brazil Wood plant prefers temperatures between 65-80°F (18-27°C). It can tolerate temperatures as low as 50°F (10°C).

Tips.title: Toxicity
Tips.content: The Brazil Wood plant is toxic to pets and humans if ingested. Keep it out of reach of pets and children.

products.name: Brazilian Wood Plant
products.description: A beautiful indoor plant
products.about: Looking for a unique addition to your home garden? Then the Dracaena fragrans Brazil Wood plant is just what you need! At first glance, this plant may not specifically stand out.But the more you get to know about it, the more you will gravitate towards it. This stunning Dracaena is just a wooden log at first but as you nurture it, it grows stunning leaves from different nodes that sprout wonderfully. This can then grow in height as well and become the most beautiful plant you’ve seen, giving you a unique and lush display in your home or garden.

Tips.title: Water twice a week
Tips.content: Always check your plants before watering, the topsoil should be dry to touch. For succulents allow the potting mix to dry completely before watering again.

Tips.title: Water
Tips.content: Water your Brazil Wood plant when the top 50% of the soil is dry. This plant is drought tolerant, so it’s better to let the soil dry out a bit between waterings.

Tips.title: Temperature
Tips.content: The Brazil Wood plant prefers temperatures between 65-80°F (18-27°C). It can tolerate temperatures as low as 50°F (10°C).

Tips.title: Toxicity
Tips.content: The Brazil Wood plant is toxic to pets and humans if ingested. Keep it out of reach of pets and children.

products.name: Bamboo Palm XL
products.description: Bamboo Palm: Lush, air-purifying, easy-care centerpiece plant.
products.about: Its lush green foliage swaying daintily in the breeze is sure to remind you of tropical resorts. The stunning green leaves grow directly from the stem and over time the spread of the plant increases to fill up the pot. An excellent air purifier the bamboo palm is easy to grow and maintain, it makes a great centrepiece in a quirky pot.

Tips.title: Water twice a week
Tips.content: Always check your plants before watering, the topsoil should be dry to touch. For succulents allow the potting mix to dry completely before watering again.

Tips.title: Water
Tips.content: Water your Brazil Wood plant when the top 50% of the soil is dry. This plant is drought tolerant, so it’s better to let the soil dry out a bit between waterings.

products.name: Anthurium Red Plant
products.description: Anthurium Red: Low-maintenance, vibrant red blooms, perfect for indoor spaces.
products.about: Anthurium Red or the Flamingo plant is a low-maintenance plant with heart-shaped red waxy blooms that last up to eight weeks. They bloom profusely for more than 250 days a year with bright indirect light and without any special attention and are the perfect size for any indoor area with their bright and shiny presence.

Tips.title: Water twice a week
Tips.content: Always check your plants before watering, the topsoil should be dry to touch. For succulents allow the potting mix to dry completely before watering again.

Tips.title: Water
Tips.content: Water your Brazil Wood plant when the top 50% of the soil is dry. This plant is drought tolerant, so it’s better to let the soil dry out a bit between waterings.

Tips.title: Humidity
Tips.content: The Brazil Wood plant prefers higher humidity levels, but it can tolerate average humidity levels.

Tips.title: Temperature
Tips.content: Place your plants on window sills where it can get the brightest possible indirect light. Bright indirect light is when the plant is within a couple of feet of a natural source of light.

Tips.title: Toxicity
Tips.content: The plant causes no harm to your pets on contact or ingestion, However, consuming indoor plants is not beneficial to their heath.

products.name: The China Doll Plant - XL
products.description: China Doll Tree: Glossy leaves, easy-care, forest-like indoor aesthetic.
products.about: With its glossy green leaves and large growth, this indoor China Doll plant is basically a tree. The woody branches of the Radermachera sinica complement its dark green leaves perfectly, creating the most wonderful indoor aesthetics. Interestingly, the plant being called the China Doll Tree has nothing to do with the country but everything to do with the fact that the tree looks - quite literally - like a doll house tree. The best part? This plant is relatively easy to care for and adds an instant forest-like feel to any space, serving as an excellent plant for balconies and patios.

Tips.title: Water twice a week
Tips.content: Always check your plants before watering, the topsoil should be dry to touch. For succulents allow the potting mix to dry completely before watering again.

products.name: Aglaonema Pink Beauty Plant
products.description: Aglaonema Pink Beauty: Low-maintenance, colorful pink leaves, perfect for low light.
products.about: If you are a first time gardener looking for an easy one, Aglaonema Pink Beauty is the plant for you. Also called the Chinese Evergreen, it will stay happy and beautiful in low indirect light with little water. Its bright pink leaves add the right amount of jazz and colour to any space and décor. A stunner with its pretty pink foliage both alone and in plant clusters.

products.name: English Ivy Plant In Hanging Planter
products.description: English Ivy: Glossy leaves, fast-growing, perfect for containers.
products.about: Growing English Ivy indoors is pure unadulterated joy with its quirkily shaped leaves that are both glossy and fleshy. The leaves are a beautiful dark green in colour and grow profusely on rapidly spreading vines and will easily climb walls and race across ground. They grow exceedingly well in containers and look beautifully tropical and lush in hanging planters.

products.name: Peperomia Green Creeper with Hanging Planter
products.description: Peperomia Green Creeper: Glossy, heart-shaped, pet-friendly, low-maintenance trailing plant.
products.about: The hanging Peperomia Green Creeper plant boasts glossy green heart-shaped leaves on thick trailing stems. Excellent for both table tops and trellises, the trailing vines of the hanging Peperomia plant stunning in vertical displays. These tropical beauties are also perfect additions to indoor spaces with their low maintenance requirements and pet-friendly nature!

products.name: Turtle Vine
products.description: Turtle Vine: Fast-growing, low-maintenance hanging plant.
products.about: The Turtle Vine Plant is a delicate perennial that grows quickly and profusely with minimum care. If you are a gardening novice and want to add beautiful hanging plants that require minimum care, the turtle vine is your answer. This resilient variety thrives in bright indirect light and grows with abandon and is extremely easy to propagate.

products.name: Broken Heart Plant
products.description: Philodendron Broken Heart: Easy-care, heart-shaped leaves, trailing vines.
products.about: One of the most popular houseplants, and our all-time bestseller, this easy-growing plant with its heart-shaped leaves is loved for its beautiful fenestrations. Quick to grow with delicate trailing vines that can be styled for every space, the Philodendron broken heart is the monstera charm you want to add to your home if you don't have the space for the huge monstera. Scientifically known as the Monstera adansonii, this broken heart plant thrives indoors in bright indirect light and with very little care.

Tips.content: Place your plants on window sills where it can get the brightest possible indirect light. Bright indirect light is when the plant is within a couple of feet of a natural source of light.

Tips.title: Toxicity
Tips.content: The plant causes no harm to your pets on contact or ingestion, However, consuming indoor plants is not beneficial to their heath.

products.name: Aglaonema Pink Beauty Plant
products.description: Aglaonema Pink Beauty: Low-maintenance, colorful pink leaves, perfect for low light.
products.about: If you are a first time gardener looking for an easy one, Aglaonema Pink Beauty is the plant for you. Also called the Chinese Evergreen, it will stay happy and beautiful in low indirect light with little water. Its bright pink leaves add the right amount of jazz and colour to any space and décor. A stunner with its pretty pink foliage both alone and in plant clusters.

Tips.title: Water twice a week
Tips.content: Always check your plants before watering, the topsoil should be dry to touch. For succulents allow the potting mix to dry completely before watering again.

products.name: English Ivy Plant In Hanging Planter
products.description: English Ivy: Glossy leaves, fast-growing, perfect for containers.
products.about: Growing English Ivy indoors is pure unadulterated joy with its quirkily shaped leaves that are both glossy and fleshy. The leaves are a beautiful dark green in colour and grow profusely on rapidly spreading vines and will easily climb walls and race across ground. They grow exceedingly well in containers and look beautifully tropical and lush in hanging planters.

products.name: Peperomia Green Creeper with Hanging Planter
products.description: Peperomia Green Creeper: Glossy, heart-shaped, pet-friendly, low-maintenance trailing plant.
products.about: The hanging Peperomia Green Creeper plant boasts glossy green heart-shaped leaves on thick trailing stems. Excellent for both table tops and trellises, the trailing vines of the hanging Peperomia plant stunning in vertical displays. These tropical beauties are also perfect additions to indoor spaces with their low maintenance requirements and pet-friendly nature!

products.name: Turtle Vine
products.description: Turtle Vine: Fast-growing, low-maintenance hanging plant.
products.about: The Turtle Vine Plant is a delicate perennial that grows quickly and profusely with minimum care. If you are a gardening novice and want to add beautiful hanging plants that require minimum care, the turtle vine is your answer. This resilient variety thrives in bright indirect light and grows with abandon and is extremely easy to propagate.

products.name: Broken Heart Plant
products.description: Philodendron Broken Heart: Easy-care, heart-shaped leaves, trailing vines.
products.about: One of the most popular houseplants, and our all-time bestseller, this easy-growing plant with its heart-shaped leaves is loved for its beautiful fenestrations. Quick to grow with delicate trailing vines that can be styled for every space, the Philodendron broken heart is the monstera charm you want to add to your home if you don't have the space for the huge monstera. Scientifically known as the Monstera adansonii, this broken heart plant thrives indoors in bright indirect light and with very little care.

products.name: Variegated Jade Mini Plant
products.description: Variegated Jade: Lucky, low-maintenance plant with colorful leaves.
products.about: The more colorful relative of the Jade plant, this variegated Jade plant is an absolute beauty indoors. With its small fleshy, coin-shaped leaves growing on reddish-brown stems, the variegated Jade is a versatile and stunning houseplant, capable of effortlessly brightening up every corner of your home. Low maintenance and lucky, the Variegated Jade Mini Plant is a popular indoor plant worldwide due to its positive connotations in the worlds of Vastu and Feng Shui. It is said to bring money and prosperity to its keepers and also makes for the perfect, fuss-free house companion.
